name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discussed Elsewhere: Reddit, Hacker News, etc

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension checks if the current tab URL is referenced in Reddit or Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you come across an interesting news article, Wikipedia entry, or random website and you wonder if others have discussed it. This Chrome extension will help you quickly check if the website has been submitted to either Reddit (as a link post) or Hacker News.

Searches included:
 * Reddit Search
 * Hacker News
 * Google Custom Search
 * Bing
